Name: Greedy Bubble
About the game: Greedy Bubble is a brutally difficult arcade game about greediness inside a cave. In this game, you control a cute bubble that is trapped inside a cave, you need to guide it out while collecting as many coins as you can ( and not loosing them ). Avoid spikes, saws and use teleporters, air pressure and others to escape. Features 30 brutally difficult levels. Retro graphics ( 80's style ). Good chiptune music to get yourself vibing :)
